Negros Oriental, 3rd District.en: This seat is currently vacant following the expulsion of the previous Representative, Arnolfo "Arnie" Alipit Teves Jr., pending a special election.
Negros Oriental, 3rd District.ph: Wala munang kinatawan mula sa distritong ito pagkatapos ng pagpapaalis sa dating Kinatawan, si Arnolfo "Arnie" Alipit Teves Jr., hanggang sa pagkaroon ng espesyal na halalan.

Palawan, 3rd District.en: This seat is currently vacant following the death of the previous Representative, Edward Solon Hagedorn, pending a special election.
Palawan, 3rd District.ph: Wala munang kinatawan mula sa distritong ito pagkatapos ng pagkamatay ng dating Kinatawan, si Edward Solon Hagedorn, hanggang sa pagkaroon ng espesyal na halalan.

Taguig-Pateros, EMBO District.en: Following the decision of the Supreme Court and the transfer of EMBO barangays from Makati City to Taguig City, there is currently no representative from this barangay, pending redistricting and a new election.
Taguig-Pateros, EMBO District.ph: Alinsunod sa utos ng Korte Suprema at ang paglipat ng mga EMBO barangay sa Taguig City mula sa Makati City, wala munang kinatawan galing sa barangay na ito hanggang sa bagong pagguhit ng mga distrito at pagkakaroon ng bagong halalan.

Valenzuela, 1st District.en: This seat is currently vacant following the appointment of the previous Representative, Rexlon Ting Gatchalian, as Secretary of Social Welfare and Development (DSWD), pending a special election.
Valenzuela, 1st District.ph: Wala munang kinatawan mula sa distritong ito pagkatapos ng pagpapatalaga ng dating Kinatawan, si Rexlon Ting Gatchalian, bilang Kalihim ng Kagalingang Panlipunan at Pagpapaunlad (DSWD Secretary), hanggang sa pagkaroon ng espesyal na halalan.
